location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Mountstuart Elphinstone, Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Riach informs Elphinstone that he had endorsed three sets of bills of exchange on the Honourable Board in favour of three named persons who had been involved with His Majesty's mission to Persia. The bills had been drawn by Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires.
